mapper.insert: insert into check_results (id, patient_id, is_urgent, lab_item_name, report_name, lab_item_code, ref_range, lab_result_sign_name, lab_final_value, visiting_no, lab_result_unit_name, audit_date, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{patientId}, #{isUrgent},#{labItemName},#{reportName}, #{labItemCode},#{refRange},#{labResultSignName},#{labFinalValue},#{visitingNo}, #{labResultUnitName}, #{auditDate}, now(), now())
